item.title: Products
item.description: As of Winter 2023, the primary eg â€œoff-the-shelfâ€ product is an engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. The eg team is also working on an package to capture online survey responses. Engagement survey ğŸ’ƒ The engagement survey has norms representing most major U.S. metropolitan areas as well as four industrial groups. The feedback report includes automatically generated presentation slides. A tutorial on the use of these slides is available here.
